tool_description:
Solves Image Captcha Using Service. Accuracy  depends on the captcha type and level of difficulty. 
Use the Basic version and check if this suits your requirements.
name: Fast OCR for Image Captcha
title: Fast OCR for Image Captcha

api_list.name: Create Image Captcha Request
api_list.description: Creates a request to solve Image Captcha. Takes base64 image as input
